I

Image - Class in org.bvsd
The Image class provides an easy-to-use interface for introductory Java students to explore image processing without having to learn the intricacies of the BufferedImage class.
Image(int, int) - Constructor for class org.bvsd.Image

P

Pixel - Class in org.bvsd
This class provides methods and data to represent an RGB/RGBA pixel where each channel is 8 bits, ranging from 0-255.
Pixel(int) - Constructor for class org.bvsd.Pixel
Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values based on the provided binary integer.
Pixel(int, int, int) - Constructor for class org.bvsd.Pixel
Constructs a pixel with specified red, green, and blue values, defaulting alpha to 1.0.
